summary: The Prime Minister of Israel is the head of the Israeli government and is the most powerful political officer in Israel.
full_text: The politics of Israel is dominated by Zionist parties. They traditionally fall into three camps, the first two being the largest: Labor Zionism , Revisionist Zionism  and Religious Zionism. There are also several non-Zionist Orthodox religious parties, non-Zionist left-wing groups, as well as non-Zionist and anti-Zionist Israeli Arab parties.
title: Politics of Israel
